resources.string: SPLASH ACTIVITY \n\nInitiate and download initial data while giving the user some eye candy. I use AndriosData to build dummy data and will eventually flesh it out to provide back end interfaces.
MAIN ACTIVITY\n\nNeed to efficiently handle images. Running into memory issues.

GENRE ACTIVITY\n\nThis should shuffle music from this genre. Need to download music and cover art. This app is designed to shuffle random music from a genre for a user. X prevents a song from being played again.
